articles.title: Kate in cheeky reference to Charlotte as she joins forces with Camilla 'Obvious reasons!' - Express
articles.description: KATE, Duchess of Cambridge, made a cheeky reference to her daughter Princess Charlotte as she teamed up with Camilla, Duchess of Cornwall.

articles.title: Nilüfer Yanya: Painless review – refined indie pop with a disquieting lyrical edge - The Guardian
articles.description: The London songwriter roots the sound of her accomplished second album in classic alt-rock, its beautiful melodies contrasting with mysteriously bleak vignettes
articles.content: Nilüfer Yanyas 2019 debut album, Miss Universe, was a thrilling mess of ideas. It came bound together by a concept satirising the wellness industry fake adverts between tracks, press releases that pu… [+4683 chars]
